Text:
Thanks Test_Verify, the crack didn't work, but I got hold of one that did, so game works perfectly, though I had to have a Steam registry value to play. You don't have to have steam installed, just export any regfile from your registry, right click on the regfile & go to edit; now wipe all data, & copy & paste the following into the open regfile:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREValve]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREValveSteam]
"Language"="english"
"InstallPath"="C:\Program Files\Steam"
"SteamPID"=dword:00000000
"TempAppCmdLine"=""
"TempAppPath"=""

Save the file when exiting and double click the regfile to enter it into your registry; this just allows you to play the game without having Steam installed. Thanks again for this upload, I'll help seed, +1, cheers.
